ClientDemographics.NotesTemplate: MEDICARE HAS INDICATED THAT THE NAME OR DOB COULD BE DIFFERENT FROM WHAT IS ENTERED INTO THE PATIENT CHART. PLEASE CONFIRM DEMOGRAPHICS WITH THE PATIENT OR REFERRAL SOURCE.  MEDICARE ELIGIBILITY COORDINATOR WILL ALSO ATTEMPT TO VERIFY CORRECTION.

InvalidOrMissingSubscriberOrInsuredName.NotesTemplate: MEDICARE DEMOGRAPHIC INFORMATION IS NOT VALID (NAME OR DOB). THE MEDICARE ELIGIBILITY COORDINATOR WILL ATTEMPT TO FIND A CORRECTION.  THE BRANCH CAN ASSIST BY CONTACTING THE PATIENT OR REFERRAL SOURCE TO VERIFY LEGAL NAME AND DOB.

InvalidOrMissingSubscriberOrInsuredID.NotesTemplate: MEDICARE NUMBER IS NOT VALID. THE MEDICARE ELIGIBILITY COORDINATOR WILL ATTEMPT TO FIND A CORRECTION.  THE BRANCH CAN ASSIST BY CONTACTING THE PATIENT OR REFERRAL SOURCE TO VERIFY MEDICARE NUMBER.
